text: Alfred Gusenbauer (born February 8, 1960, in St. Pölten, Austria) was the chancellor of Austria from January 2007 to December 2008. His party won the elections of 2008, and he was succeeded as Chancellor the new party leader, Werner Faymann, on 2 December 2008. He was the leader of the political party SPÖ. == Other websites == * Official page (in German) * SPÖ Official Homepage * Homepage of the Austrian Chancellor Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Chancellors of Austria Category:People from Lower Austria
title: Alfred Gusenbauer
